membership:
2017 memberships : 
* European Automobile Manufacturers’ Association (ACEA) 
* American Chamber of Commerce EU (AmCham EU) 
* British Chamber of Commerce in Belgium (BritCham) 
* Verband der Automobilindustrie (VDA) 
* BusinessEurope A&SG Group 
 
Since Jan 1, 2018 Opel is not a Member anymore of ACEA and Amcham EU, but Opel's new parent company Groupe PSA  is a member of ACEA.
goals__remit:
Opel was founded by Adam Opel in Rüsselsheim, Germany in 1862 and is one of Europe’s largest automakers. Opel and its British sister brand Vauxhall sell over one million vehicles annually. 
 
Opel is headquartered in Rüsselsheim. The company operates ten plants and three development and test centers in seven European countries. Opel/Vauxhall employs around 35,000 people in Europe. Opel and Vauxhall are present in over 50 countries. 
 
Opel is since 2017 part of Groupe PSA (Peugeot S.A.) with following identification number in the Transparency Register: 39900807417-87.
